title: FSS@CCAOKC.ORG
content: Hello,My name is Latrisha Gang I'm currently homeless due to COVID-19 .I lost my job at Crossmark Inc. a distribution company that sets up demo's for Sam's Club throughout Okc metro area.I've applied for section-8 housing and they told me that I would have to sign up for emergency housing and get a referral in order get housing quicker .Im currently looking for employment through zipcriuter,indeed as well as Oklahoma unemployment office .I would really love to have a job and a place of my own so that I can regain my self esteem as well as being an independent woman.Thank You .You may reach me at (405)902-6212 or by email @ latrishagang8@gmail.com.

title: Screenshots are not downloaded on Firefox
content: I have a problem with Firefox screenshot taking feature. When I open the context menu (by right-clicking) on a webpage and choose "Take Screenshot", then I choose an element in the page, it gets selected. The problem is that when I click "Download", nothing happens! I went to the download folder and didn't see the image! How to fix this problem?
creator: KingMassen

title: Narrow font on some websites
content:
On websites that renders text in the users' installed fonts, the text gets rendered in Arial Narrow. This only happens on Firefox; attached are screenshots of https://nyaa.si/ and https://mpv.io/ on Firefox and in Chromium.

A quick glance at about:config with the search term "font" shows no modified settings.

Any fixes?
creator: fakeymcnoexist

title: My SSL secure site is blocked "Secure Connection Failed"
content:
Hello Firefox. You have been my go-to browser for many years now. I am always using the latest version for Mac. About ten days ago, two of my four sites became blocked, with the "Secure Connection Failed" notice.

I am a low-income independent working artist who needs for people to have access to my sites. GoDaddy sees no issue on their end (all four of my sites are under the same deluxe hosting account with the exact same SSL encryption), and all four sites show up on Safari and Chrome. Until now, I have preferred Firefox.

https://www.alexalev.com/ https://www.paintedjay.com/

These are the results at Why No Padlock using the Firefox browser: https://www.whynopadlock.com/results/447e5a19-3baa-4374-ba79-a9829eeef737

According to Why No Padlock, everything is perfect.

To make matters screwier, none of my sites are e-commerce or take info from people. They present information and there are links off site to places like Amazon and Instagram, but there is nothing of a security issue on any of them, PLUS I have SSL encryption properly configured, anyway, no matter what, so that there would be no issue.

Please re-instate public access to my sites. I am sure this is a glitch of some kind. Nothing else explains it, but I need them to be LIVE ASAP, as I am trying desperately to make some kind of a living with the pandemic having cancelled all my shows. Thank you!

Alexandria
creator: pinkjaykitty

title: Blocks instead of font characters for text & numbers.
content: Hi A newly opened Firefox page has unintelligible blocks for text and numbers. They are multicoloured.. Attached image I have tried in safe mode and same occurs. Looked at Fonts and tried various changes with no success. When firefox opens existing windows and tabs may not have the problem. A new tab such as this one will be ok. Move to new window and problem occurs. But not consistently ok or not. This has been occurring intermittently for some time. Any ideas please? Thanks for your help.
creator: iainhamilton6649

title: Italic fonts are very small on some websites on Windows 11 - fresh install, no customization
content: The title says it all. When I was running Win10, things were fine. I then did a clean install of Win11, and loaded Firefox. zero changing of settings. I do a simple test by going to an entry on Wikipedia, and I noticed all the uses of italic font were very small. This didn't happen a half hour earlier with Win10. Enclosed as an image is a sample screenshot.
creator: j-comm

title: Cambio del zoom en una página
content: Tengo un problema con una pagina que se sale de la configuración personalizada del zoom, lo tengo en 67% pero cada vez que abro esta pagina siempre lo cambia a 100%.
creator: paul_caceres

title: Why can't I log on to LastPass password manager like I use to?
content:
I have used LastPass for seven years. It sure is not perfect, but it certainly help maintain my online security.

So what on earth has happened? I can long on using my saved master password using both Chrome, and Bing ( the latest Microsoft browser - can't remember the name). I don't like to use either. I strongly prefer FireFox.

Beginning within the last month (I think - not exactly when) all of a sudden the LastPass log on procedure changed. Now, only with FireFox, when I click the LastPass icon a dialog box appears asking me to accept Permissions. I click accept, and the log on window appears. The program no longer fills in my email address, nor my stored master password. On the other browsers it does just as it used to do on FireFox.

Moving to the bottom of the LastPassword (using FireFox) log on dialog box to advanced options I always choose to activate the "save email" and save "password" options. Even when I manually enter my email address and master password LastPass does not save either my email or master password.

Mozilla needs to fix this! LastPass is one of the most popular password managers, and this situation is harmful to Mozilla and FireFox reputations and therefore popularity. Purely out of convenience I find myself using Chrome again often. This makes me unhappy on a lot of levels. Please get it done: Fix LastPass on FireFox!
creator: d.brew.mayfield

title: accessing bom.gov.au returns "website does not currently support connections via HTTPS."

I first thought that it was a site specific problem but when I tried with Internet explorer I had no problems. I also can access the site successfully with my mobile phone where I also use Firefox. Is there a setting I have overlooked?
